<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Accursed Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=3833) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 169</row>

**Archetype** [Curse Maelstrom](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=190)

**Prerequisites**
[Curse Maelstrom Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3829)

</column>

---

When the curse within you spills out, you can lay curses on others and claim them for yourself with ease. You can cast [_claim curse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=884). At 10th level, you can also cast [_seal fate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=715), and at 12th level, you can also cast [_inevitable disaster_](/Spells.aspx?ID=930). You can cast these spells once per day as occult innate spells, but only while within your curse maelstrom state. If you couldn't already cast occult spells, these spells use Wisdom as your spellcasting ability, and you become trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells.
